short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revolutionizing Accessibility. Making reading and research easier for all

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EzyRead is designed to support individuals with learning disabilities (Dyslexia, ADHD, ADD, and more) in comprehending research and readings while on the internet more effectively.  Through customizable features such as article to video generation, adjustable text size, font changing, line spacing, alternate syllable highlighting,  colorblind overlays, and audio narration/text-to-speech, users can tailor their reading experience to suit their unique needs. With EzyRead, bridge the gap between users and the vast resources the internet offers.
